dream.name: BioGenesis
dream.description:
This is an iterative mathematical function over a grid of cells.
This function borders the boundary of stability and chaos. While the grid is initially populated by random noise structures quickly see structures emerge. Some of these structures are quite rare and fun to spot. See http://wwwhomes.uni-bielefeld.de/achim/freq_top_life.html for a frequency table
